deals.details: GMO Cookies is a powerful indica marijuana strain made by crossing Chemdog with GSC. This strain produces relaxing effects you can feel through your body while your mind retains focus. GMO Cookies is loved for its ability to relieve stress and aches without total sedation. GMO Cookies features aromas like diesel, coffee and fruit. Medical marijuana patients choose this strain to help relieve symptoms associated with chronic pain.

deals.details:
We are excited to announce that we are using CanPay to offer debit payment for you!  CanPay is safe, using only the latest technology to keep your information secure.  To download the app please go to www.canpayapp.com. Be sure to have your checking account# and routing# handy. This process can take 1 to 24 hours to link with your account so keep that in mind when using CanPay for the first time. (How to get Started) 

After creating an account, select "e-transfer" at checkout to pay with CanPay instead of cash. When we bring your order simply login to the Canpay app for a generated a QR code which our drivers will scan at the door. And that's it! No more dealing with cash.
Note: QR codes expire after 30 minutes.
deals.title: Attention! Anybody who wishes to use a debit card/checking account for payment please read the following.

deals.details:
JOIN exists to support the efforts of individuals and families experiencing homelessness to transition into permanent housing. Our efforts are directed at individuals sleeping outside or in their car in the Portland Metro area. Our service provision is not dependent on age, gender, race, ethnicity, faith, culture, language, sexual identity, specific diagnosis, or identifiable issue.

JOIN is striving to become an anti-racist organization â€“ because we are building toward a future that is inclusive and equitable. 
JOIN is a partner â€“ because we trust people to be the primary agents of change in their own lives. We reflect strengths and walk alongside people on their journey to stability.
JOIN is centered in relationships â€“ because we believe in community. 
JOIN is creative to conquer complexity â€“ because the complex issues surrounding homelessness requires innovation and flexibility.
JOIN is ever-evolving, living and organic â€“ because we are all continuously learning and growing.

Help us dontate warm clothing and camping gear and to earn 15% OFF your purchase! We will be dropping off donations to JOIN PDX - visit https://joinpdx.org/needs/ for a complete list of acceptable items.
deals.title: JOIN PDX Love

deals.details: Bridge City Collective offers 5% off your total purchase for Teachers, Firemen, Seniors, Students, and if you biked to our locations. Ask about Military/VA Discounts! We also offer discounts for returned plastic pop-tops and childproof exit bags!
